name: Pigot's Plan of Manchester (1808)
description: First edition of James Pigot's plan of Manchester. Pigot first appears in a 1794 Manchester business directory as an engraver; began publishing maps from 1804.
notes:
Flickr scans from Manchester Archive Plus.
Multiple Pigot editions exist: 1808, 1811, 1813, 1819, 1821, 1824.
